How many people are affected by arginine:glycine amidinotransferase deficiency ?,The prevalence of arginine:glycine amidinotransferase deficiency is unknown. The disorder has been identified in only a few families.,GHR,arginine:glycine amidinotransferase deficiency
What are the genetic changes related to arginine:glycine amidinotransferase deficiency ?,"Mutations in the GATM gene cause arginine:glycine amidinotransferase deficiency. The GATM gene provides instructions for making the enzyme argi
